name: Scaramouche
overview: They are the years of the reign, in France, of Luis XXIV, this King has managed to form a fierce personal guard of swordsmen experts among which are the mythical Portos, Artos, Aramis and, of course, the ineffable D'artagnan. You, SCARAMOUCHE, can choose to stand by their side and face the intrigues who pretend to overthrow the King or form part of those who face such fearsome strength. In any case you must be a great pitcher before facing any of them.
